text: int main ( void ) { int T , N ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; int t , i ; for ( t = 0 ; t < T ; t ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; int prev , curr ; prev = scanf ( "%d" , & prev ) ; int count = 0 ; int contin = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & curr ) ; if ( curr >= prev ) contin ++ ; else { count += ( contin * ( contin + 1 ) ) / 2 ; contin = 0 ; } prev = curr ; } count += ( contin * ( contin + 1 ) ) / 2 ; count += N ; printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
